Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: He said I'll love you till I die.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Dear George, I was sitting in my office the other day,

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: and I was thinking about the days had gone by,

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: remembering the good times you and I had had

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: and trying to avoid the bad.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Over and over again, I kept wondering,

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: what would life be like should the Lord come today

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: and take my good friend George Jones off into the night?

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: I kept telling myself why it couldn't be.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: but knowing all along that it is surely sooner than I would believe.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: So I wrote a last message to my good buddy George,

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: and it's one that I think you ought to listen to,

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: one that you sure need to hear.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: It goes something like this.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Many of us go through life worrying and fretting

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: because we don't have regular bowel movements.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: The most important thing to remember about a normal bowel

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: is that your own pattern is normal

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: for you. Some people have bowel action after every meal. Some have it as rarely as once a week.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Lack of daily bowel action does not harm your health. It does not cause pimples, acne, or other

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: facial blemishes. It does not cause cancer or growths in the intestines nor any other disease.

Speaker: SPEAKER_00
Text: Your bowel will move when it's ready to.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: It's so hard watching you, for I really like to see you stick around a while.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: He stopped.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Can you hear me, George?

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Can you hear me?

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Don't leave me.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: Because I sure love you, George.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: This is your old friend, Roy.
